result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lawrence R. Krueger

records.addlTxt: Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State. Defendant did not appear. Clerk/S. Garcia. Attorney Henry contacted the Court and stated she was unavailable due a to family medical emergency, however there was no information given that the DE should not appear.  ADA Binger requests a warrant.  The Court orders that bond is forfeited and authorizes a warrant; $2,000.00 cash.

Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.   Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Henry. Clerk HM.   DE has new charges 22CM1143. PTC set over to 9/28 11:30am. Bond continued.

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Henry.   Clerk HMcBride. Atty Henry just appointed and requests adjmt.  Granted.  PTC 9/8 9am. Bond continued.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Michelle S.  The DE may make arrangements with a party or law enforcement to retrieve personal property and/or medication from the victim's Michelle S's residence within 48 hours of the 72 hour No Contact has expired.  The DE may not be the party retrieving any property and/or medication.

02:18 PM   State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.   Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Christopher Bub.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.   Plea of Not Guilty entered. Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 02:10 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm. $1000  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event). mi
and witness list filed by the State
